attributes.action: Ensure that Local authorities cannot raise the council above the annuual rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council tax rises vary every year. Different Local Authorities raise the council tax annually by different amounts.

Many Local authorities keep the rise low just before a General Election to try and influence the voting.

If we are to keep the council Tax, it is only fair that it is not increased above the annual rate of inflation and this keeps it even across the country.

It is time that we, as the people are able to predict and budget for Council tax increases.

Support this petition and lets save ourselves money.
